FuncDef: The display dhcp snooping user-bind command displays information about the DHCP snooping dynamic binding table. The display dhcp snooping user-bind command displays information about the DHCP snooping dynamic binding table.
CLIs: display dhcp snooping user-bind { { interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } | ip-address <ip-address> | mac-address <mac-address> | vlan <vlan-id> | bridge-domain <bd-id> } | all } [ verbose ]
display dhcp snooping user-bind { { interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } | ip-address <ip-address> | mac-address <mac-address> | vlan <vlan-id> } | all } [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
interface-name specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays binding entries mapping a specified IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays binding entries mapping a specified MAC address.
The value is in H-H-H format. Each H is a hexadecimal number of 4 digits.

Displays binding entries mapping a specified VLAN ID.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1023.

Displays DHCP snooping running information in a specified BD.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Displays all entries in the binding table.
-

Displays detailed information about the binding table.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display dhcp snooping user-bind all verbose
